creator: egorlizlov@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 33810
Error reading csv-file example

Bug works like this: when the "Thread Group" starts a second request, it takes one line of the CSV, despite the fact that its reading is in OnceOnlyController.

For example, see attachment with plugins Standard Set, Extras Set, Extras with Libs Set.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 33943
Test plan without jp

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
I don't understand the bug you report.
I can see CSV is only read once per Thread which is the expected behaviour.

http://jmeter.apache.org/usermanual/component_reference.html#Once_Only_Controller

Can you give more details ?
Thank you
